title: Beat Factory Rap Essentials Volume 1
description:
--  Beat Factory Rap Essentials Volume 1  -- 192kbps --

Rap Essentials Volume One is a Canadian hip hop compilation album, released in 1996 by Beat Factory Music. It's considered a "landmark" hip-hop album, and it was very influential.

Three songs from the albumÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½"Naughty Dread" by Kardinal Offishall, "Fitnredi" by Rascalz, and "Bright Lights, Big City" by Scales EmpireÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½were nominated for Best Rap Recording at the 1997 Juno Awards. "Dear Hip Hop" by Dan-e-o is considered a "Canadian hip-hop classic".

Music videos for "Dear Hip Hop", "Bright Lights, Big City", and "Sunlight" by Wio-K were put into rotation by MuchMusic.
